step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Ensure you feel that gentle resistance to help with lymph flow.
Excellent! Keep that arm extended overhead as you begin to make a fist.
Well done! As you exhale, open your hand wide and relax your muscles. Imagine the fluid moving.
Perfect! Continue to open your hand and relax your muscles on the exhale. You're doing great with this movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a fantastic job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm up, make a fist while breathing in, and open your hand while breathing out. Keep up the great work to help reduce fluid buildup.
